heading: Today
text: Any early clouds north giving way to sun, then mixing with afternoon clouds. Highs from the mid 20s to mid 30s, warmest west and south.  Winds northwest near 10 mph from the Green Mountains east, a few gusts to 20 mph, becoming light.  Light winds west, becoming southwest 10 to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Becoming cloudy.  A rising chance of snow showers in NY, spreading east after midnight, mostly from Rt. 4 north, south through the mountains.  Lows in the teens to near 20.  Winds light east of the Green Mountains, becoming south 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Thursday
text: Variable clouds, with scattered snow showers north, more numerous in NY, with a few brief, heavier squalls, spreading south in the afternoon.  A dusting to 2 inches.  Early highs in the 20s north, falling through the teens, and 30s south, falling through the 20s.  Winds becoming northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 25 to 35 mph.
